A top lab on hemorrhagic viruses is around the very spot where Ebola emerged.

@ajewishatheist Yeah, this story seems feasible. But it's far from confirmed (no *published* study finds Ebola virus in a bat in that region). I suspect a theory this loose wouldn't be acceptable if Ebola were Covid, and Guinea were China.
